dc_title_s: Map of the Island of Bombay : index to progress
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:14,400]. 1 in. = 1200 ft. Relief shown by hachures and form lines. Index to cities with epidemic statistics. Includes script signature for"chairman plague committee."|132 x 71 centimeters, on sheets each 68 x 75 centimeters|Scale [1:14,400]; 1 inch = 1200 feet|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
